title: GA5 Question 8 Clarification
text: You must use `gpt-3.5-turbo-0125`, even if the AI Proxy only supports `gpt-4o-mini`. Use the OpenAI API directly for this question.

title: GA5 Question 8 Clarification
text: My understanding is that you just have to use a tokenizer, similar to what Prof. Anand used, to get the number of tokens and multiply that by the given rate.

title: Pandas GroupBy Doubt
text: Use `df.groupby('col')` and then apply aggregation. Refer to Week 3 video on Pandas operations.
